title: Breakingviews TV: Tesla charge
text:
Breakingviews TV: Tesla charge 3:49pm BST - 04:56 
China said it would scrap pesky foreign ownership limits on electric-car manufacturers this year. Pete Sweeney and Jeffrey Goldfarb discuss why Elon Musk's embattled $50 billion company might be the one to benefit most from the decision. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
China said it would scrap pesky foreign ownership limits on electric-car manufacturers this year. Pete Sweeney and Jeffrey Goldfarb discuss why Elon Musk's embattled $50 billion company might be the one to benefit most from the decision.
